name: Zero to One
body: It is a book on startups. It will help you start up a business. It is by an American entrepreneur and investor Peter Thiel co-written with Blake Masters.

name: Atomic Habits
body: It is a Newyork Times bestseller. Stock this book to change your habits by taking simple, easy steps. It is best for productivity. The book is written by James Clear.

name: Leaders Eat Last
body: The book is by Simon Sinek. It will be your favourite book on leadership. A must-read for all the people who think they are leaders!

name: Five Stars
body: It's a book on communication skills. Stock it for knowing how to get to master the art of persuasion. This book is by the best-selling author Carmine Gallo.

name: Just Listen
body: A book by Mark Goulston. A highly recommended book if you want to increase your influence and be more persuasive. You can stock this book for make you a stronger communicator.

name: Shoe Dog
body: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike Phil Knight. The history of Nike and its early challenges to its evolution into one of the world's most recognized and profitable companies are drawn here nicely.
